intro.text: Northern Lights Casino is a traditional land-based casino that attracts players from all over Canada and abroad. This is a unique, inimitable establishment where you can enjoy your favorite gambling games and have a great time.

Today, Northern Lights Casino is rightly considered one of the main places for recreation and entertainment in Western Canada. The building is located in a unique place, which the locals call "Gateway to the North".

The entire complex called Northern Lights Casino Prince Albert occupies a total area of ​​over 46 thousand square feet. Here you will find an incredible gaming floor, as well as an excellent restaurant with a stage for live performances. By the way, this casino has hosted many very famous artists in recent years. Therefore, you can visit Northern Lights Casino events in advance by checking the schedule of planned events.

You should definitely consider booking a room at the Northern Lights Casino hotel. This will allow you to spend a few days in this amazing place, play your favorite games, take part in tournaments and enjoy all the benefits of a gambling house. At Northern Lights Casino hotels Prince Albert, you will find a warm welcome, soft beds and amazing service.
